General.Name: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited engages in the generation and distribution of electricity from solar and biomass power plants in Thailand and Japan. It operates solar PV farm, solar rooftop, and solar floating projects, as well as biomass powerplants. The company serves government and private sector clients The company was formerly known as Siam Solar Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited in 2009. Thai Solar Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
